Name: Mexicas
History: Nahua people from the current south of USA or Sonora, founded their city state Mexico-Tenochtitlan in 1325. They dominated a large part of central and southern Mexico until the arrival of the Spanish in 1521 that together with the subject peoples ended the Mexica Empire in 1521.
